itunes:title: Episode 384 - Breast Feeding On The First Date
title: Episode 384 - Breast Feeding On The First Date
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, Evan Hafer, and Dan Hollaway are joined by BRCC's "Disgustin' Justin" to discuss his craziest Tinder stories, JT's recent turn to sobriety, as well as the Colin Kaepernick settlement with the NFL for $80 million. Stay tuned...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, Evan Hafer, and Dan Hollaway are joined by BRCC's "Disgustin' Justin" to discuss his craziest Tinder stories, JT's recent turn to sobriety, as well as the Colin Kaepernick settlement with the NFL for $80 million. Stay tuned after the show as Mat Best debuts his new love song "Pu$$y Whistle".
